backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted list of summaries for many frontend files describing their functionality and UI behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining extensive light/dark theme CSS variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint loading fonts, syncing dark mode from localStorage, and mounting the React app.
frontend/public/study-planner-mockup.htm: Standalone mockup HTML with inline styles and CDN React for a styled study planner UI demo.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for dashboards, subjects, and utility pages with Layout and error boundary.
frontend/src/components/AddChapterDialog: Dialog component for adding a chapter with form inputs for name, lecture count, and duration.
frontend/src/components/AllChaptersBySub: Displays subjects with their completed and incomplete chapters, grouped and visually separated with status badges.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedIcon.tsx: Wraps a Lucide icon with simple active-state animation styling.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that shows error details and provides actions to recover or reset local data.
frontend/src/components/BottomNavigation: Bottom navigation bar that lists core routes and dynamically adds subject links with active state styling.
frontend/src/components/ChapterCard.tsx: Chapter card with timers, status display, manual time entries, editing controls, and work session management.
frontend/src/components/ChapterDetailPan: Slide-in panel for editing chapter fields, updating status, and viewing computed targets and metadata.
frontend/src/components/DashboardComplet: Renders a bar chart summarizing completion percentages across subjects.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: App layout with header, page transitions, customization panel, and bottom navigation.
frontend/src/components/MonthGridCalenda: Renders a navigable month grid calendar with selectable days and optional entry indicators.
frontend/src/components/NotificationsSec: Aggregates incomplete chapters, todos, and today’s calendar entries into a notifications card.
frontend/src/components/OverallPerforman: Computes test score trends and displays a performance line chart with trend indicators.
frontend/src/components/PageTransition.t: Provides a fade transition wrapper that reacts to router path changes.
Displays and manages a list of subject-specific resources with add and delete actions.
frontend/src/components/SubjectCompletio: Shows subject chapter completion stats with a progress bar and chapter grid, highlighting newly completed items.
frontend/src/components/SubjectDeleteBut: Provides a confirmation dialog and toast feedback for deleting a subject and its chapters.
frontend/src/components/TasksDrawer.tsx: Drawer component showing navigation and subject-specific tasks with add, toggle, and delete functionality.
frontend/src/components/TestScoreChart.t: Renders a responsive SVG chart (line or bar) visualizing test scores with scaling, grid lines, and tooltips.
frontend/src/components/TodoList.tsx: Displays a subject’s to-do list with task creation, completion toggling, and deletion inside a card layout.
frontend/src/customization/applyDarkMode: Applies or removes the dark mode class on the document root based on user override settings.
frontend/src/customization/Customization: A simple icon button that opens the customization settings panel.
Side panel UI for modifying study settings like target hours, speed, sleep window, and visual preferences.
Context provider managing customization settings, draft edits, and dark mode override application.
frontend/src/customization/integration.t: Utility functions for notifications, sleep window checks, card density, and target-hour/date calculations.
frontend/src/customization/settingsModel: Defines customization settings, defaults, and a validator ensuring values stay within valid ranges.
frontend/src/customization/useCustomizat: Manages saving, loading, applying, and deleting named customization presets with localStorage persistence.
React hook for loading, validating, updating, and persisting UI customization settings in localStorage.
frontend/src/data/chapters.ts: Defines chapter data structures and exports a large initial list of chapters with metadata for all subjects.
frontend/src/data/subjects.ts: Defines subject metadata plus legacy route and name mappings for backward compatibility.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCalendarEntries.ts: Manages calendar notes stored per date with load, save, add, update, and delete operations in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useChapterData.ts: Loads, saves, syncs, and mutates chapter progress data across tabs using localStorage and the storage event.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentlyWorkingCh: Tracks active chapter work sessions with timing, pause/resume, persistence, and version migration.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardNote.ts: Loads, saves, and updates a simple dashboard note string in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardTitle.ts: Loads, saves, and updates the dashboard title with localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, login flow, and stored identity handling via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotes.ts: Manages note creation, updating, deletion, and persisted storage with versioning. Syncs notes to localStorage and generates timestamps and unique IDs.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook exposing actor and loading state for future backend React Query integrations.
frontend/src/hooks/useResources.ts: Manages subject-specific resources with migration from legacy formats and versioned localStorage. Supports adding and deleting resources while maintaining global storage consistency.
frontend/src/hooks/useStudyLog.ts: Handles study log entries with persistence, daily hour calculation, and sleep-window notifications. Adds timestamped entries and syncs them to localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubjectDetails.ts: Stores and updates per-subject metadata like goals and dates using versioned localStorage. Exposes getters and updaters for subject details.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubjects.ts: Manages subject list persistence with add/delete and duplicate prevention. Loads defaults and stores versioned subjects in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useTests.ts: Manages test definitions and scores with chart settings, stored in versioned localStorage. Supports adding, editing, scoring, and deleting tests.
frontend/src/hooks/useTodos.ts: Manages subject-specific todos with migration from legacy formats and versioned persistence. Allows adding, toggling, and deleting todos.
frontend/src/hooks/useTodosAll.ts: Provides access to all todos across subjects, reloading from localStorage on storage events. Exposes a getter for the full todo list.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive light/dark theme CSS variables plus background overlays and global base styles.
frontend/src/lib/appLocalStorage.ts: Provides centralized management of app-specific LocalStorage keys with reset and accessor utilities.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a `cn` helper that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it in React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/CalendarDashboard.tsx: Implements a calendar dashboard with monthly navigation and per‑day to‑do entry management.
frontend/src/pages/Customize.tsx: Provides UI for editing customization settings, managing presets, and adding or deleting subjects and chapters.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Displays study stats, active chapters, editable dashboard title/note, and a hero section with charts and notifications.
frontend/src/pages/Notes.tsx: Implements a notes interface supporting creation, editing, selection, and deletion of text notes.
frontend/src/pages/SubjectPage.tsx: Implements the subject detail page, handling chapter listing, editing subject metadata, chapter CRUD, and time‑tracking controls. Uses multiple hooks and UI components to manage state, navigation, and interactions.
frontend/src/pages/Tests.tsx: Provides UI for creating, editing, and deleting tests and scores, with validation, chart settings, and expandable test sections. Relies on useTests for data operations and displays performance graphs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, radii, shadows, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations. Sets up dark mode and file content paths for class scanning.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, issues, image needs, and feature descriptions for an ongoing study‑tracker UI/UX rebuild. Acts as a centralized state file guiding fixes and enhancements.
